bibl.title: The Tetrarchic Fort at Nag al-Hagar in the Province of Thebaïs: Preliminary Report (2005-8).
bibl.note: The Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at Nag al-Hagar. - The state of research at the Late Roman fort. - The dating evidence of the fine wares. - Topographical and geophysical surveys. - Excavations in the SE part of the fort. - Résumé.
bibl.seg: Michel Mackensen, The Tetrarchic Fort at Nag al-Hagar in the Province of Thebaïs: Preliminary Report (2005-8).

The Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at Nag al-Hagar. - The state of research at the Late Roman fort. - The dating evidence of the fine wares. - Topographical and geophysical surveys. - Excavations in the SE part of the fort. - Résumé.
